segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and the woman doesn’t even flinch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, but she just keeps drying that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for the cookies, and the stool looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her treat, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm the scene outside the window is compared to this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s focus is so intense it’s almost funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll notice anything before someone gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spreading everywhere, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to fall, and the girl will probably get splashed with water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around soon before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
